title: LONGBOW: A Billionaire Stepbrother With Benefits Romance
description: How much more stress can one woman take?First he steals her clients.Then he makes her feel forbidden thoughts.Then he becomes her stepbrother.Last night he left he all alone on the couch....And NOW?Now he's her boss again.It's time to stand up for herself and take control of her destiny.How can she choose - between boring, stable TIm...and obnoxious, arrogant, irresistible...He is pulling her as taut as a LONGBOW.
author: Cynthia Sharon
